dialogueTree.title: Southwest Entrance to the Tenements: "A sturdy metal door guards the sout..."
dialogueTree.text: A sturdy metal door guards the southwest entrance to the apartment building. It's locked.

links.title: Visual Calculus: "This could be a way into the apartm..."
links.text: This could be a way into the apartment building the smoking man vanished into.

links.title: You: "Knock."
links.text: Knock.

links.title: Southwest Entrance to the Tenements: "The door rattles against your knuck..."
links.text: The door rattles against your knuckles, but there's no response.

links.title: You: "Knock again."
links.text: Knock again.

links.title: Southwest Entrance to the Tenements: "The door rattles again, but this ti..."
links.text: The door rattles again, but this time you hear an elderly woman's voice calling out from inside...

links.title: Cleaning Lady: ""Stop banging on the door! I'm not..."
links.text: "Stop banging on the door! I'm not letting any more strangers inside."

links.title: You: ""Hold on, who am I speaking to?""
links.text: "Hold on, who am I speaking to?"

links.title: Cleaning Lady: ""It doesn't matter who I am. Now go..."
links.text: "It doesn't matter who I am. Now go on, get out of here!"

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "From within comes the faint sound o..."
links.text: From within comes the faint sound of a broom sweeping across the concrete floor.

links.title: You: ""This is the police -- open the doo..."
links.text: "This is the police -- open the door."

links.title: Cleaning Lady: ""The police?! Everyone knows the po..."
links.text: "The police?! Everyone knows the police don't come around *here*.“ The hallways echoes with her cackle.

links.title: You: ""Please, let me inside. It's cold o..."
links.text: "Please, let me inside. It's cold out here."

links.title: Cleaning Lady: ""No, I already told you, I won't be..."
links.text: "No, I already told you, I won't be responsible for any more strangers getting into the building..."

links.title: Cleaning Lady: ""Go check the backyard door, maybe..."
links.text: "Go check the backyard door, maybe someone there will..." She trails off, leaving the sentence unfinished.

links.title: Interfacing: "Backyard door? With the smoker? You..."
links.text: Backyard door? With the smoker? You already were there. Didn't work.

links.title: Visual Calculus: "Backyard door? There must be anothe..."
links.text: Backyard door? There must be another entrance to the east.

links.title: You: ""But I'm not joking.""
links.text: "But I'm not joking."

links.title: You: ""I need to talk to a young man in t..."
links.text: "I need to talk to a young man in this building."

links.title: You: ""Hey, are you there? I've checked t..."
links.text: "Hey, are you there? I've checked the backyard, but couldn't get in that way."

links.title: Cleaning Lady: ""Good. We've had enough problems wi..."
links.text: "Good. We've had enough problems with bums and drunks and thieves loitering in the hallway... You have no business here."

links.title: You: ""Kim, tell her we're real policemen!""
links.text: "Kim, tell her we're real policemen!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Madam, I assure you we're real pol..."
links.text: "Madam, I assure you we're real police officers," the lieutenant repeats dutifully.

links.title: Southwest Entrance to the Tenements: "There is no reply. Just faint sweep..."
links.text: There is no reply. Just faint sweeping sounds inside.

links.title: You: ""Ma'am, we're looking for Billie Mé..."
links.text: "Ma'am, we're looking for Billie Méjean's apartment. We have important news to deliver."

links.title: Southwest Entrance to the Tenements: "No reply. You can hear faint sweepi..."
links.text: No reply. You can hear faint sweeping inside; a gust of wind blows through your clothes.

links.title: You: "Convince her that you're a real pol..."
links.text: Convince her that you're a real policeman.

links.title: Authority: "You're well versed in the kind of t..."
links.text: You're well versed in the kind of threatening legalese that implies criminal liability but in fact has no meaning whatsoever.

links.title: You: "Am I?"
links.text: Am I?

links.title: Authority: "Obviously. Look at that vague yet t..."
links.text: Obviously. Look at that vague yet threatening stuff spewing forth from your mouth...

links.title: You: ""Ma'am, your non-compliance is hind..."
links.text: "Ma'am, your non-compliance is hindering a police matter. I may be forced to refer you for potential prosecution."

links.title: Cleaning Lady: ""I know my rights! And don't you 'm..."
links.text: "I know my rights! And don't you 'ma'am' me, boy!" the voice snaps back.

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "But the sweeping on the other side..."
links.text: But the sweeping on the other side has stopped.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Miss," the lieutenant jumps in, "w..."
links.text: "Miss," the lieutenant jumps in, "would it help if we offered to show you our badges?"

links.title: Rhetoric: "Ah! It's like a carrot to the stick..."
links.text: Ah! It's like a carrot to the stick, sort of.

links.title: Cleaning Lady: ""Hold your horses..." You hear the..."
links.text: "Hold your horses..." You hear the click of a night latch, before the lady on the other side gets caught in a coughing spasm.

links.title: Cleaning Lady: ""I don't care about your stinkin' b..."
links.text: "I don't care about your stinkin' badge. Just come in," she manages to say with a wheeze.

links.title: Authority: "Insufficiently deferential!"
links.text: Insufficiently deferential!

links.title: You: ""Okay, miss, would it help if I sho..."
links.text: "Okay, miss, would it help if I showed you my badge?"

links.title: You: "(Lie.) "I've got my badge right her..."
links.text: (Lie.) "I've got my badge right here, if you want to see it."

links.title: Authority: "You already tried and all you got w..."
links.text: You already tried and all you got was *hurt*. Better not to try anymore. Then you won't get HURT.

links.title: Authority: "You can't think of anything convinc..."
links.text: You can't think of anything convincing. Time for some police brutality!

links.title: You: ""I'm gonna light this place up!" (R..."
links.text: "I'm gonna light this place up!" (Roll up your sleeves.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No, you're not.""
links.text: "No, you're not."

links.title: Cleaning Lady: ""You don't scare me, punk! I may be..."
links.text: "You don't scare me, punk! I may be an old woman but I can still take the likes of you!"

links.title: You: ""Open up or I'm gonna breach this m..."
links.text: "Open up or I'm gonna breach this motherfucker!" (Kick the door.)

links.title: You: ""Ma'am, if you don't open this door..."
links.text: "Ma'am, if you don't open this door, I'm gonna introduce you to a lateral vascular neck restraint -- and it's going to *hurt*."

links.title: You: "[Leave.]"
links.text: [Leave.]
